com.ibm.cs.model

Class Batch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.cs.model.Batch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Batch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing a single batch, consists one or multiple Items of a particular Product type. For example: You can have a batch of 150 pieces (items) of 'Colgate White 50ml' product
    Author:
    Dan Alejandro A. Vargas
    See Also:
    Product, Item, Serialized Form
